attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: YOU WILL NEVER GET SAVERS TO SPEND WHILE THEIR INCOME FROM SAVINGS R BEING ERODED.PUT MONEY IN YOUR VOTER'S POCKETS THEN THEY WILL SPEND.CHEAP EXPORTS ACCOUNT FOR A SMALL PART OF GDP SO LET THEM COPE.YOU WANT TO REDUCE BORROWING BUT DO NOTHING TO HELP.PLEASE ENCOURAGE SAVING.IS IT NOT POSSIBLE TO HAVE DIFFERENT TIERS OF INTEREST RATES?1 FOR SAVERS 1 FOR BORROWERS.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
